item.title: The Bhagavad Gita for Millennials, by Bibek Debroy - A Review
item.description: The book's easy explaining style, coupled with scientific temper by which the author goes about elaborating without sounding preachy, makes it a must read starter text for anyone who wants to know about The Bhagavad Gita.
